characters.name: Gorgon
characters.backstory: A figure shrouded in mystery, Gorgon commands respect through sheer presence. Their origins are obscured in shadows, their motives unclear.

characters.name: Chevy
characters.backstory: Fast in thought and deed, Chevy moves through life with kinetic energy. A natural problem-solver who acts before thinking consequences through.

characters.name: JP
characters.backstory: Cloaked in riddles and paradoxes, JP's true nature remains a puzzle. Their wisdom comes from unexpected places.

characters.name: Jeremy
characters.backstory: A guardian by nature, Jeremy stands between chaos and balance. Their protective instincts drive every decision and conflict.

characters.name: Tea
characters.backstory: Compassionate and caring, Tea brings warmth to those around them. Their strength lies not in force but in understanding.

characters.name: FNFFan
characters.backstory: Music flows through their veins. FNFFan finds harmony in chaos and balance in discord.

characters.name: Irish
characters.backstory: A traveler of endless roads, Irish carries the weight of journeys untold. Always moving, never settling.

characters.name: Umbra
characters.backstory: Existing between light and darkness, Umbra operates in the margins. Their presence is felt rather than seen.

characters.name: Rebecca
characters.backstory: Lost in worlds of imagination and possibility, Rebecca sees what others cannot. Her visions shape reality.

characters.name: Chao
characters.backstory: Untamed and unpredictable, Chao embraces chaos. Their wild nature is both a strength and a vulnerability.

characters.name: Bloo
characters.backstory: A companion to those who dream, Bloo brings levity and support. Small in stature, infinite in heart.

characters.name: Good Woman
characters.backstory: A light in darkness, Good Woman represents hope and moral clarity. Her convictions are unshakeable.

characters.name: Evil Man
characters.backstory: Driven by ambition and ego, Evil Man challenges the status quo through conflict. His motivations are complex.

characters.name: PM73
characters.backstory: An artificial construct or digital entity, PM73 exists in the space between code and consciousness. Purpose unclear.

characters.name: Killer Jeremy
characters.backstory: A twisted reflection of Jeremy, this version chose violence over protection. A cautionary tale of corruption.

characters.name: Pestilence
characters.backstory: A force of entropy and decay, Pestilence spreads disruption wherever they go. Whether force or consequence remains unknown.

characters.name: Queen of Jesters
characters.backstory: A master of manipulation and misdirection, the Queen weaves games of wit and cunning. Nothing is as it seems.

characters.name: Green Guy
characters.backstory: Quietly watching from the margins, Green Guy sees more than he reveals. His silence speaks volumes.
